name: La Sportiva Nepal EVO Gore-Tex Mountaineering Boots - Men's
description: Time-tested Nepal Evo boots with a cosmetic upgrade. Stay dry and secure while looking sharp. The GORE-TEX® lining makes them warm and reliably waterproof in snowy environments. Polyurethane inserts in the midsole and a thick, thermal insole absorb impacts to keep your feet comfortable. An ideal choice for any alpine or ice adventure.3.2mm silicone-impregnated Idro-Perwanger leather upper with highly abrasion-resistant fabric and sticky rubber rands.GORE-TEX insulated comfort membrane for waterproof-breathable protection.Flexible ankle system provides ample lateral support, yet is forgiving enough to allow challenging crampon placements.Elastic snow gaiter helps keep snow and spindrift outside.9mm thermal insoles minimize cold conduction.Tapered and graded polyurethane midsole feels lively underfoot while still providing superb stiffness with crampons on steep ice.Shock-absorbing PU inserts under the heel and the ball of the foot.Vibram® Matterhorn outsole has IBS (Impact Brake System), designed to soften impact on hard ground and improve overall traction.
